title: Pasta with tuna
ingredients: ['250g short pasta (such as penne, macaroni)', '1 (150g) tin tuna in olive oil, drained', 'juice and zest of 1/2 large lemon', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 handful fresh basil, finely chopped', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 (30g) tin anchovies in oil, drained', '1 clove garlic, thinly sliced', '2 teaspoons capers', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1/2 bunch fresh parsley, finely chopped']
